title: Selling personal property, defined
context: ยง233-3 Selling personal property, defined. As used in this chapter &ldquo;the business of selling tangible personal property&rdquo; includes both business classed as such under chapter 237 and also the rendering of a service which involves the consumption or use of tangible personal property furnished by the &ldquo;potential employer&rdquo; referred to in section 233-1. [L 1959, c 277, ยง5(b); Supp, ยง117A-3; HRS ยง233-3]
